      • hasLicense

        public boolean hasLicense(java.lang.String licenseName,
                          java.lang.String privilegeName,
                          java.lang.String pi)
                   throws PresentationException,
                          IndexUnreachableException
        Description copied from interface: ILicensee
        Checks whether the licensee has a license with the given name. IF a privilege name is passed, the licensee must also have this privilege for that license.
        Specified by:
        hasLicense in interface ILicensee
        Parameters:
        licenseName - License name.
        privilegeName - Required privilege (optional).
        pi - Checks the privilege in connection with a specific record identifier (optional).
        Returns:
        Throws:
        PresentationException
        IndexUnreachableException

      • canSatisfyAllAccessConditions

        public boolean canSatisfyAllAccessConditions(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> conditionList,
                                             java.lang.String privilegeName,
                                             java.lang.String pi)
                                      throws PresentationException,
                                             IndexUnreachableException,
                                             DAOException
        Checks whether the user can satisfy at least one of the given access conditions with a license that contains the given privilege name. If one of the conditions is OPENACCESS, true is always returned. Superusers always get access.
        Parameters:
        conditionList -
        privilegeName -
        pi -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IndexUnreachableException
        PresentationException
        DAOException
